name: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
description:
The Wild Thornberrys Movie is a game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Wild Thornberrys Movie is available on PC.
It was produced by Arlene Klasky, Gabor Csupo and Gábor Csupó. Cathy Malkasian, Charlie Adler and Jeff McGrath directed the game. It was scored by Drew Neumann.
